name: TUA-252
description: This test case verifies that error messages is displayed after user leaves fields empty and clicks 'Наступний крок' button on 'Основна інформація' tab
descriptionHtml: This test case verifies that error messages is displayed after user leaves fields empty and clicks 'Наступний крок' button on 'Основна інформація' tab

testStage.description: This test case verifies that error messages is displayed after user leaves fields empty and clicks 'Наступний крок' button on 'Основна інформація' tab

steps.name: Authorize user with valid email admin@gmail.com and password admin
Click on dropdown for authorized user in top right corner of header
Click on 'Мій профіль' button in dropdown for authorized users
Delete possible values from 'Назва центру' field
Checking that error message 'Некоректна назва центру’ appears under 'Назва центру' field
